https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/3uenwgfTxzrTlqVndvU4N9kNhBS.jpg Mallory is the head of an elite government-run strike force dedicated to combating the supernatural. Her team includes the drag queen Vena Cava, an explosives expert; a mute, pre-teen telepath capable of possessing others named Talking Tina; and an armed governmental agent named Durand. Bloody Mallory
